# External Documentation

User-facing documentation for arch-explorer, organized using the [Diataxis](https://diataxis.fr/) framework.

## Documentation Types

### [Tutorials](./tutorials/)
**Learning-oriented** - Step-by-step lessons for getting started.

### [How-to Guides](./how-to/)
**Task-oriented** - Practical recipes for specific tasks.

### [Reference](./reference/)
**Information-oriented** - Technical specifications and API docs.

### [Explanation](./explanation/)
**Understanding-oriented** - Conceptual discussions and background.
